articles.title: Jon Jones helps clean up after chaos in downtown Albuquerque - KOB
articles.description: MMA champion fighter Jon Jones and a group of his friends returned to downtown Albuquerque Monday to help businesses clean up following a night of rioting.
articles.content:
Jones said he stepped up because he cares about community.
